Name: StepX
About the game: The most popular music game is now available on Steam. The easiest way to realize your musical ideas is with just a few mouse clicks. In front of you is a panel (kind of a launchpad) with notes with different musical instruments. There's a few musical instruments (Kicks,Snares,Hits,some Percs,Piano board and more).You can adjust the tempo, volume, tonality,key and scale.Change delay time and add fx effects. You can import and export your creations to saved presets.Any inspired imagination can be made by this tiny but powerfull virtual launchpad by just your power of thought and mouse clicking.
